comment: No minority group anywhere will ever feel at home so long as they are a minority. You can't blame them, either. Our countries were built by us for us, based on our legal systems, enforcing our standards and upholding our values. When whites become minorities in their own countries we'll know full well why being a minority sucks. We must not let that happen.
